name: TheOtherAmericaYourChoice
0:
”Alexa, launch other america”
”Alexa, load other america”
”Alexa, ask other america to listen to the demo”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: other america
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Experience authentic BIPOC perspectives through first-person fictional stories as a "citizen" of The Other America. 

Your choices will determine everything from the stories or music you hear to the bonuses you unlock. 

Each story gives you unlimited access to all your choices! You don't need to sit through a million ads to get through the whole story. 

+ Discover new BIPOC writers/authors
+ Unlock exclusive bonuses/deals from our BIPOC-owned business partners.
+ Listen to music from rising BIPOC artists
+ Join a diverse community of like-minded people
+ Earn access to exclusive in-person and virtual experiences

Try stories before you buy them so there are no regrets. 

HOW TO USE: 

Get started by saying, "Alexa, ask Other America to pass through customs," and Alexa will take you directly to a FREE story excerpt. 

AVAILABLE PREMIUM STORIES (new episodes, stories, and bonuses released regularly):

> I Am Carlos Benito - is an action-thriller like no other. Who are you? What have you done? Was it even you? It's a race against the clock to clear your name or make a fantastic escape.

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! Please consider showing your support by writing a review for The Other America: Your Choice, or email us your feedback at otheramericastories@gmail.com.
